scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dev:chromium && npm run build-dev:firefox
scripts.build-dev:chromium: NODE_ENV=development vue-cli-service build --mode chromium && BROWSER_TARGET=chromium node ./scripts/get_possible_types.js
scripts.build-dev:firefox: NODE_ENV=development vue-cli-service build --mode firefox && BROWSER_TARGET=firefox node ./scripts/get_possible_types.js
scripts.build: npm run build:chromium && npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:chromium: NODE_ENV=production vue-cli-service build --mode chromium && BROWSER_TARGET=chromium node ./scripts/get_possible_types.js
scripts.build:firefox: NODE_ENV=production vue-cli-service build --mode firefox && BROWSER_TARGET=firefox node ./scripts/get_possible_types.js
